attributes.action: No school lotteries schools in the said area where you live should be improved or teachers moved around not lotteries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where I live after a deadline date of 31st October is reached, other children from outside the area can apply for admission to the school.The government say everyone should be entitled to go to a good school,they've built the odd academy recently the schools in these areas have had public money spent on them millions,but children and parents still dont send them there so now the government are going to send children from all over to these schools.Address the problem in these areas but don't put me and my children into your problems.shifting my children to these schools won't change a thing government sort these area
s out don't drag me into it!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
